version_description: Minor bug fixes from your feedback!

We have a HUGE update with you in mind! And for a LIMITED TIME, PRO is only $1.99! Upgrade now!

* Elegant summary screen to track your progress and streaks!

* Export your fast data and save it! - PRO users

* Notifications and reminders - PRO users
-- Set reminders to start your fast
-- Get notified when you reach your goal

* Elegant weekly and calendar views - PRO users
-- View your weekly progress and data
-- Edit your fast data
-- View your monthly progress and goals!

* Set your fast duration up to 48 hours

* On the home screen you can now see the time lapsed and countdown!

-Now you can edit your fast directly from the summary screen chart by tapping on the bars
-In progress fasts will now show on your summary, weekly and calendar screen
-Fixed scrolling issue between summary, weekly, and calendar for users with a lot of data
-Small fix for notifications when users updated start time

Haven’t updated recently? Last week we released a *BIG* update with a Pro version that’s $1.99 for LIMITED TIME.

Pro features include:
- Notifications and reminders
- Support for longer fasts
- Data export
- Enhanced tracking views.

Thanks to everyone for your excitement and feedback on the last release. If you’re enjoying Fast Habit, help us spread the word with a 5 star rating and review. Thanks!

Thanks to everyone for the feedback! This release includes better support for multi-day fasts and overall improvements to the stats screens for both Pro and free users.

- Now if you fast for longer than 24 hours, the last 10 Days chart and calendar will show completed days for all the days your fast covers and your streak will be unbroken.
- We’ve also removed in-progress and current day fasts from the stats screens for a cleaner view.

Enjoying Fast Habit and like the updates? Help us spread the word with a review!

We've added a widget to make starting and tracking your daily fast even easier.
- Start fasts, see remaining time, and stop your fast all from your home or lock screen.

We've added a widget to make starting and tracking your daily fast even easier.
- Start fasts, see remaining time, and stop your fast all from your home or lock screen.

We've added a widget to make starting and tracking your daily fast even easier.
- Start fasts, see remaining time, and stop your fast all from your home or lock screen.
Fixed syncing issues between the Apple Watch and the iPhone app.

We've added a widget to make starting and tracking your daily fast even easier.
- Start fasts, see remaining time, and stop your fast all from your home or lock screen.

Happy New Year - We've added an Apple Watch app! Start, stop, and track your fast right from your watch.

Added iCloud Syncing so you can transfer your data when you move between devices

Improved the Stats View and UI for users who fast for 24 hours or longer - [Pro Only]
* New version of the Stats display specifically for ‘Extended Fasting’. ‘With this mode, your streaks will be calculated as the number of fasts in a row where you hit your target length and the chart displays your last 10 fasts instead of last 10 days. To turn this on, go to Settings and select ‘Stats display'
* Set target lengths up to 5 days

Other styling improvements and small bug fixes

A big thank you to everyone who gave us a review on the last version, or wrote us a feedback email, or both!
We've improved notifications, made some small bug fixes, and added a new animation.  As always, thanks for the reviews and feedback emails!
We've improved notifications, made some small bug fixes, and added a new animation.  As always, thanks for the reviews and feedback emails!
We've improved notifications and made some small bug fixes, and added a new animation.  As always, thanks for the reviews and feedback emails!
Fixed syncing issues between the Apple Watch and the iPhone app.
Improved syncing between the iPhone and Apple Watch app when starting a fast or changing the target time.

• Fixed a crash for people updating from an old version (and recovered wiped data)

And, answering popular user requests:
• Enhanced the widget to show end time
• Added a confirmation before restarting your fast

• Fixed a crash for people updating from an old version (and recovered wiped data)


And, answering popular user requests:

• Enhanced the widget to show end time

• Added a confirmation before restarting your fast

• New Views for your In-Progress Fasts: Choose between remaining time or time fasted by swiping the countdown circle.
• Added the time of your next Start Fast reminder in the home screen (only PRO users)
• Improved synchronization of your fasts between the iPhone, the Apple Watch and iCloud.
• Made the streak count always visible on the home screen.
• Fixed an issue that was causing fasts logged for the same day in different years to appear together in the weekly summary.

Thanks for all the great feedback everyone! Please help us spread the word about Fast Habit with reviews and 5-star​ ratings.

• New Views for your In-Progress Fasts: Choose between remaining time or time fasted by swiping the countdown circle.
• Added the time of your next Start Fast reminder in the home screen (only PRO users)
• Improved synchronization of your fasts between the iPhone, the Apple Watch and iCloud.
• Made the streak count always visible on the home screen.
• Fixed an issue that was causing fasts logged for the same day in different years to appear together in the weekly summary.

Thanks for all the great feedback everyone! Please help us spread the word about Fast Habit with reviews and 5-star​ ratings.

- Apple Watch Complications (at last!)
- Ability to change target fasting hours while fast is in progress
- New app guide with tips on how to get started and use Fast Habit
- Improvements to iCloud syncing

If you’re enjoying the app, please write us a review to let others know! And as always, a big thank you to those who sent us feedback emails and feature suggestions.

- Visual design updates.

If you’re enjoying FastHabit, please write a review to help us spread the word! Many thanks to everyone who emailed us since the last update- keep the feedback coming.
Minor improvements and small bug fixes

• We've now made Reminders available to everyone! (Did you know that users with reminders are three times more likely to be consistent in their fasting? To set reminders, just go to settings.)
• Pro Users, we've added a special new reminder feature so you can set an early reminder 5 minutes, 10 minutes, 30 minutes, or 1 hour before.

We’ve added weight tracking and syncing with the Apple Health app for pro users! Now you can track your weight on FastHabit, get data from the Health App, and see your progress. There’s also a ‘fasting overlay’ feature on the weight chart so you can compare your weight progress directly with your fasting trends.

Thanks to everyone who wrote to us about this feature and gave their thoughts on what they’d like to see. We’ve got more features coming up, so please keep sending feedback and posting reviews!
Improvements to our weight tracking feature and new complications for Apple Watch 4
Improvements to weight tracking charts
Improvements to weight tracking charts
* Performance improvements for an even smoother experience
